remarks: Lemma for ~ pjhth .  (Contributed by NM, 10-Oct-1999.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-May-2014.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
pjhth.1 $e |- H e. CH $.
pjhth.2 $e |- ( ph -> A e. ~H ) $.
pjhthlem2 $p |- ( ph -> E. x e. H E. y e. ( _|_ ` H ) A = ( x +h y ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d H x y $.
$d ph x y $.
